scripts.deploy:creds: eb setenv AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID eb setenv AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY eb setenv POSTGRES_USERNAME=$POSTGRES_USERNAME eb setenv POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD eb setenv POSTGRES_HOST=$POSTGRES_HOST eb setenv POSTGRES_DB=$POSTGRES_DB eb setenv AWS_BUCKET=$AWS_BUCKET eb setenv AWS_REGION=$AWS_REGION eb setenv AWS_PROFILE=$AWS_PROFILE eb setenv JWT_SECRET=$JWT_SECRET eb setenv URL=$URL eb setenv PORT=$PORT
scripts.deploy:build: npm run api:deploy && npm run frontend:deploy
